column5: If you haven't already heard about this in Binbrook...It appears we have a big time problem to solve. This lake is legendary for producing large numbers of Crappie....The guide for  eating sportfish says 4 Meals not 2 as it states in the article(reduced from 8). All other fish besides perch are not recommended for eating. There is not a lot of info on the damage it can do to a persons body compared to many other chemicals the ministry tests for. Women of child bearing age and young girls have to follow the limit more closely than the men.....  My link
Ok, I see that...does anyone read the news there? I will start....
Well they should, Pics.  Thanks for posting.
